text: River Cottage Spring is a Channel 4 television programme. It follows Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall at his Dorset home and his teaching school River Cottage. It shows him and his team, harvesting crops, cooking organic food and teaches families how to be smallholders. He also challenges Tesco to change its chicken products from battery-farmed to organic and free-range reared.Chicken is the only meat sold in the UK which legally does not have to be sourced. "Chicken products" refers to the eggs as well as the meat. ==References== ==Other websites== * River Cottage Spring on Channel 4 TV * Category:2008 British television series debuts
title: River Cottage Spring
